summary: This document is an email correspondence between Vahe Stepanian and Lisa D Hurd regarding a financial matter related to a partial reclaim. The email discusses a specific transaction and confirms that the reclaim has been approved, indicating internal communication within Deutsche Bank Securities.

events.title: Residual Duplication
events.description: A residual amount was duped in a financial transaction, leading to a reclaim process.

keyFacts: The email correspondence is dated October 15, 2013.
A financial transaction involving a residual amount of $55,173.24 was discussed.
The reclaim for the financial transaction has been approved.
The email is classified as confidential under federal rules.
Amanda Kirby is included in the correspondence, indicating her role in the matter.
